snippet: The proposals would require the Fed to set monetary policy based on a published formula, would eliminate the Fed’s responsibility to maximize employment, or would eliminate the body entirely.
abstract: House Republicans frustrated by Federal Reserve’s expansive economic stimulus campaign and its growing role as financial regulator are renewing efforts to constrain the central bank.
lead_paragraph: The proposals would require the Fed to set monetary policy based on a published formula, would eliminate the Fed’s responsibility to maximize employment, or would eliminate the body entirely.

headline.main: House Republicans Resume Efforts to Reduce Fed’s Power
headline.print_headline: House Republicans Resume Efforts to Reduce Fed’s Power

keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
